/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings line the sides of the street, adding to the urban atmosphere. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and architecture in the cityscape.
